title: Computer Science Foundational Competency Enhancement Course Using Hybrid Service Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of introductory programming concepts or computer application experience
context.additional_context: A course for employees using smartphones as the primary tool, emphasizing the application of computer science concepts to solve real-life problems.

learning_goals: Learners can apply core computer science concepts (algorithms, data structures) to real-life scenarios
Learners can plan and execute small-scale projects using collaborative tools in mobile environments
Learners can utilize outcomes developed through service-learning activities to address community issues

resources: Collaborative mobile apps (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
